Classes¶

class visit_model_helper.VisitModelHelper[source]¶

Bases: object

Help determine the name of the visit model foreign key and to return a queryset of that field for select/dropdowns (e.g. formfield_for_foreignkey in admin).

I separated this code from BaseVisitModelAdmin because other models may wish to use it in their ModelAdmin which may not inheret from BaseVisitModelAdmin. For example, the lab requisition has a visit model foreign key, needs to determine the visit field and get a queryset for the select/dropdown but its ModelAdmin class does not inheret from BaseVisitModelAdmin.

classmethod get_field_cls(cls)[source]¶

Given a class, returns the model class that is a subclass of BaseVisitTracking.

classmethod get_field_name(cls)[source]¶

Given a class, returns the field attname that is a subclass of BaseVisitTracking.

get_visit_model(instance)[source]¶

given the instance (or class) of a model, return the visit model of its app

set_visit_queryset(**kwargs)[source]¶

Returns a queryset of one visit model for the admin change form dropdown.
